title: Tribeca Film Festival Reloaded
long_description:
Some people have the Oscars, some have Cannes and others have the Tribeca Film Festival (TFF). Created in 2001 to revitalize Lower Manhattan through the seventh art, the TFF has become a platform of creativity and cinematic innovation. And the Royalton New York Hotel has everything you need to know in one place.

 

Here’s how it works. Each year, thousands of filmmakers and artists submit their films for consideration and those selected are screened in a national, international or world premiere. But that’s not all! Tribeca Immersive is an annual program of interactive exhibits that prides itself on using cutting-edge technology to wow spectators. What’s more, live music, the Tribeca ESPN Sports Film Festival, Tribeca Talks, free panels and the long-awaited awards join the TFF party every year.

 

This year, the TFF will run from April 18-29 and is comprised of an exquisite lineup of 55 short films, 96 feature films and the world premiere of feature length documentary “Love, Gilda,” which honors the legacy of comedian Gilda Radner. To consult the full lineup, visit the TFF website. Once you find the many films you’ll probably want to see, here are the next steps.

The TFF is just a month away. Now is the time to book your room at the Royalton New York Hotel. Select one of our special offers and enjoy the sophistication of great cinema and an iconic hotel. Don’t forget to grab a few drinks after the show at Bar 44.
